"Then wear the gold hat, if that will move her; If you can bounce high, bounce high for her too, Till she cry 'Lover, gold-hatted, high-bouncing lover, I must have you!' ----THOMAS PARKE D'INVILLIERS Xavier Yao\nAll rights reserved.\nAudio licensed under Creative Common Sample Plus 1.0"
